SEARCH
Package Entity

Class Application

java.lang.Object
Entity.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents a student's application for an internship opportunity. An application tracks the student's request, the company's response (approve/reject), the student's acceptance decision, and any withdrawal requests.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen

    Application(int applicationNumber, String internshipID, String company, String studentID, List<String> studentMajors)
    Constructs a new Application with default status "pending".

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(int applicationNumber, String internshipID, String company, String studentID, List<String> studentMajors)
      Constructs a new Application with default status "pending".
      Parameters:
      applicationNumber - unique identifier for this application
      internshipID - the ID of the internship being applied to
      company - the company offering the internship
      studentID - the ID of the applying student
      studentMajors - list of the student's majors

    • Application

      public Application(int applicationNumber, String internshipID, String company, String studentID, String status, String acceptance, String withdrawStatus, List<String> studentMajors)
      Constructs an Application with all fields specified (used when loading from database).
      Parameters:
      applicationNumber - unique identifier for this application
      internshipID - the ID of the internship being applied to
      company - the company offering the internship
      studentID - the ID of the applying student
      status - the application status ("pending", "approved", or "rejected")
      acceptance - student's acceptance decision ("yes", "no", or null)
      withdrawStatus - withdrawal request status ("pending", "approved", "rejected", or null)
      studentMajors - list of the student's majors

    • getAcceptance

      public String getAcceptance()
      Gets whether the student has accepted or rejected the approved application.
      Returns:
      "yes" if accepted, "no" if rejected, null if not yet decided
